title: Product Ranking with RANKX
dax:
Sales Rank = 
VAR CurrentProductSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR ProductSalesTable =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ALLSELECTED(Product[ProductKey]),
        "@Sales", CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
    )
VAR DistinctSalesValues =
    DISTINCT(SELECTCOLUMNS(ProductSalesTable, "@Sales", [@Sales]))
VAR Ranking =
    COUNTROWS(FILTER(DistinctSalesValues, [@Sales] > CurrentProductSales)) + 1
RETURN
    Ranking

title: Top 5 Products with TOPN
dax:
Top 5 Sales = 
VAR CurrentProduct = SELECTEDVALUE(Product[ProductKey])
VAR ProductSalesTable =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ALLSELECTED(Product[ProductKey]),
        "@TotalSales", CALCULATE(SUM(Sales[Net Price]))
    )
VAR RankedProducts =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        ProductSalesTable,
        "@Rank", RANKX(ProductSalesTable, [@TotalSales], , DESC, DENSE)
    )
VAR Top5Products =
    FILTER(RankedProducts, [@Rank] <= 5)
VAR IsInTop5 =
    COUNTROWS(FILTER(Top5Products, [ProductKey] = CurrentProduct)) > 0
VAR Result =
    IF(IsInTop5, SUM(Sales[Net Price]), BLANK())
RETURN
    Result

title: Safe Ratio with Cascading Fallbacks
error: Measure name incorrectly parsed (includes VAR)
dax:
VAR NetPriceTotal = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR UnitCostTotal = SUM(Sales[Unit Cost])
VAR MarginCalculation = 
    DIVIDE(
        NetPriceTotal - UnitCostTotal,
        NetPriceTotal,
        0
    ) * 100
RETURN
    IF(
        NetPriceTotal = 0 || ISBLANK(NetPriceTotal),
        0,
        IF(
            MarginCalculation < 0,
            0,
            MarginCalculation
        )
    )

title: Safe Year-over-Year with Missing Data
dax:
Safe YoY Change = 
VAR CurrentYearSales = SUM(Sales[Net Price])
VAR PreviousYearSales = 
    CALCULATE(
        SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
        SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR('Date'[Date])
    )
VAR Result = 
    SWITCH(
        TRUE(),
        ISBLANK(CurrentYearSales) && ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), 0,
        ISBLANK(PreviousYearSales), CurrentYearSales,
        CurrentYearSales - PreviousYearSales
    )
RETURN
    Result

title: Fiscal Year-to-Date (July Start)
dax:
Fiscal YTD Sales = 
VAR CurrentDate = MAX('Date'[Date])
VAR CurrentYear = YEAR(CurrentDate)
VAR CurrentMonth = MONTH(CurrentDate)
VAR FiscalYearStart = 
    IF(
        CurrentMonth >= 7,
        DATE(CurrentYear, 7, 1),
        DATE(CurrentYear - 1, 7, 1)
    )
RETURN
CALCULATE(
    SUM(Sales[Net Price]),
    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] >= FiscalYearStart && 'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate
    )
)

    )
RETURN
CALCULATE(

    FILTER(
        ALL('Date'),
        'Date'[Date] >= FiscalYearStart && 'Date'[Date] <= CurrentDate
    )
